uniandes.unacloud.agent.system

Class WindowsOS

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.unacloud.agent.system.OperatingSystem
      • uniandes.unacloud.agent.system.WindowsOS

  • public class WindowsOS
extends OperatingSystem
    Class which represents Windows Operating System Response commands and execute tasks for this OS

    CesarF
